Items.Name: Nanjing KOPS Instrument Technology Co Ltd
Items.Description:
Founded in 2018, Nanjing Kops Instrument Technology Co., Ltd. is mainly engaged in instrument sales, system integration and service in the field of environmental protection, and has established a perfect quality assurance system. The company has established long-term cooperation with ABB and other international industrial instrument brands.
The company's main business includes: Sales and after-sales service of ABB AO2000, EL3000 series analyzer and other analytical instruments; ABB-ACX150CEMS, ABB-FID-VOCS, ABB-PGC5000 chromatographic system, ABB-MBGAS-3000 high temperature Fourier system integration, sales and after-sales service, etc.
The company has high-quality technology research and development team, perfect management system, advanced integration scheme and perfect detection means, providing high-quality high-end environmental monitoring instruments and systems for various pollution source enterprises, equipment manufacturers, government departments, etc. for a long time.
The company adheres to the service tenet of "based on service, survive on quality and develop on science and technology", and wholeheartedly provides high-quality service for users with first-class products.

Items.Name: Newtech Intelligent Automation Ltd
Items.Description:
We are a leading manufacturer of automated ultrasonic cutting and commercial 
slicer machines and robotic handling solutions. Working principally in the food 
and associated industries, you will find our commercial food equipment meeting 
the growing demand for automated processing, particularly in the area of food 
product slicing, portioning and handling. 

Our product range covers the portioning requirements of the cheese, bakery, 
meat and sandwich industries, and includes standard machines as well as bespoke 
automation solutions. 

To meet the demands of our customers in the area of robotics, we have joined 
forces with ABB, a world leader in robot technology, which means we are able to 
offer the optimum solution for robotic handling and cutting. 

In 2011, we were awarded the European ABB Channel Partner Award for 'Most 
Innovative Use of Robotics' - for our robotic slicing systems. 
Specialties 
Ultrasonic Cutting Systems for Food Industry, Robotic handling systems, 
Automated Robotic Systems, High Speed Cutting for Food Industry, Cheese cutting 
systems, Bakery portioning systems, Robotic pick and place systems, Machine 2D 
and 3D vision automation

Items.Name: Ningbo Dazheng Industrial Robot Technology Co Ltd
NJCSI Pty Ltd
Items.Description:
NJCSI is a professional engineering service provider of Process Control, 
Industrial Automation and Information Systems. We focus on the design and 
integration of control systems and related management information systems to 
meet our customer’s specifications for performance and reliability.  We also 
provide related Business IT services.

We aim to be the “provider of choice” selected because of our reputation for 
producing quality, innovative solutions which represent outstanding value to 
our customers. 

Our highly skilled engineers are selected not only for their superior skills, 
but also because they share the NJCSI “can do” attitude with a positive, 
friendly and efficient approach to the challenges they develop solutions for.

We will continue to exceed the expectations of our customers, in our quest to 
be recognized as a leading provider of world class industrial automation and 
control systems!

The core business of NJCSI is providing Automation, Industrial IT and MIS 
solutions to entities across diverse industries. While focus is on the design 
and installation of control and management systems to customers’ specification 
for performance and reliability, NJCSI also provides ancillary and related 
Business IT services. Based on a solid engineering background and resource base 
of experienced professionals, NJCSI is able to provide a comprehensive service 
to both Industrial and Corporate clients, including:

•	Process Control Engineering
•	Industrial Automation & Systems Integration
•	Project Management
•	MES and MIS Systems
•	ERP Integration
•	Industrial IT & Advanced Networking
•	Secure Internet VPN Solutions
•	Virtualisation and Disaster Recovery Solutions

Items.Name: Nortech Engineering and Automation Ltd
Items.Description:
Nortech Engineering is a relatively new company who are committed to offering creative and credible solutions to solve the demands of our customers.
Nortech invest and work with modern technology such as 3D design and CNC machining. Nortech believe in offering opportunities to young engineers and as such have undertaken apprentices to work along side our very experienced team of engineers to build the business for the future.

Nortech design, manufacture, build and test all within our own company and as such are able to service the equipment we build without relying upon contracted companies!

Nortech offer a wide range of services including the following.

Design and Manufacture of bespoke machinery
Fabrication
CNC Machining
Leak Test Fixture’s
Assembly Fixture’s
Welding Fixture’s
Gauges
Consultancy
Contract Design
Machine Refurbishment

Items.Name: Opiflex Automation AB
Items.Description:
OpiFlex develops, produces and supplies a mobile robot concept. The Foundation is a mobile robot platform. The platform has a modularized structure, which means that it has a lot of flexibility to meet the new needs of applications and subsystems to be integrated in a later stage. OpiFlex carries expensive subsystem such as robot, robot controls, safety solutions, communication equipment, grippers, etc.

The platform is available in various versions; both manual and automatic movement, with different robot sizes. We use standard industrial robots with high reliability from the major robot manufacturers.

OpiFlex also provides standardized material supply systems for robotic solutions, as well as magazines, grippers, sensors and logistics solutions.

OpiFlex offers a solution with simplified programming, so that the robot can quickly and easily be reprogrammed for new products by the operator himself.

Items.Name: P&R CONTROL SYSTEMS PVT LTD
Items.Description:
1. Company Organization: 

We, P  & R Controls Systems Pvt. Ltd. a company incorporated in April 2009, are 
involved in the business of Supply of Industrial Automation and Control 
Products and Services and Manufacturing of Systems Solutions and of offering 
specialized Engineering Services in the area of Industrial Automation and 
Controls. 

2. Customer Base: 

We have a wide customer base of  active customers in diverse areas, viz, power 
generation, boilers, food processing and beverages, automotive, 
pharmaceuticals, building controls, heat ventilation and air conditioning, 
material handling, process plants, engineering machinery, machine tools, paper, 
textiles, metal processing, specialty chemicals, test equipment etc, including 
well known companies. Our customers also include a laree number of well managed 
small industries catering to the needs of wide variety of industrial 
application,. This wide customer base helps us minimize dependence on a few 
large customers and provides us with a very good stability in terms of the 
business volumes and the operating margins. 

Our customer base comprises primarily of large, medium and small OEMs (Original 
Equipment Manufacturers. The OEMs are characterized by their potential to give 
repeat business. We leverage our strong local presence, our ability and drive 
to quickly respond to the customers, the technical expertise of our in-house 
human resource team, our ability to maintain good levels of stocks, and our 
importance to our principals, viz ABB  to forge long term business 
relationships with our customers which run through over extended periods. We 
have a successful track record of generating, developing and retaining long 
terms customer relationships with important customers. 

  3. Business Information
3.1       Systems Integration and Solutions Offerings in Industrial 
Manufacturing and Process
             Automation involving the following Scope of Activities I 
Responsibilities:
3.1.1.     Application Identification
3.1.2.     Application Engineering

3.1.4.     Energy Audits and Energy Conservation
3.1.5.     Basic Engineering
3.1.6.     System Design and Detail Engineering
3.1.7.     Setup, Configuration and Programming
3.1 .8.     Application Software Development
3.1.9.      Testing
3.1.10.    Supply
3.1.11.    Installation and Commissioning
3.1.12.    Performance Guarantee
3.1.13.   After Sales Service and Maintenance Contracting

Items.Name: P.U.P. Skamer - ACM Sp. z.o.o.
Items.Description:
Firma SKAMER-ACM za  podstawowy cel swojego istnienia przyjęła pomoc wszystkim 
potrzebującym w sensownym wdrażaniu automatyki. Przyjazne kontakty z 
praktycznie wszystkimi firmami działającymi w branży automatyki w Polsce 
pozwalają na wypracowanie dla każdego kontrahenta odpowiedniej dla niego 
zarówno technicznie jak i ekonomicznie oferty. Każda oferta stanowi optymalne 
powiązanie produktów różnych firm z preferencją polskich producentów przy 
zachowaniu wymaganej jakości i niezawodności instalacji. Kadra techniczna w 
większości z wyższym wykształceniem stale podnosi swoje kwalifikacje przy 
jednoczesnej poprawie zarządzania.

Dzięki wieloletniemu doświadczeniu Firma może podjąć się wszelkich zadań 
związanych z kompleksową realizacją instalacji pomiarów i automatyki 
przemysłowej - od najprostszych  pojedynczych pomiarów do najbardziej złożonych 
i rozbudowanych, wymagających zastosowania sterowania rozproszonego.

Firma dziala w dwóch lokalizacjach: Siedziba Glówna w Tarnowie oraz Oddzial w 
Krakowie.

Items.Name: PDM Prozessdatenmanagement GmbH
Items.Description:
Wir realisieren Projekte in der Energie-, Verfahrens- und Umwelttechnik sowie in der Prozeßindustrie. Dabei planen, realisieren und liefern wir sowohl leit- als auch elektrotechnische Anlagen. Zuverlässigkeit, Flexibilität, Kundenzufriedenheit und hohe Qualität gepaart mit langjährigen Erfahrungen in der Mess- und Regel-, Automatisierungs- und Verfahrenstechnik sowie Prozeßoptimierung zeichnen unser Unternehmen aus.

Unsere Kernkompetenzen in der Automatisierung (Deutschlandweit):
- Industriekraftwerke (Kesselanlagen und Turbinen)
- Feuerungsanlagen (Öfen und Brennersteuerungen)
- Papierproduktion 
- Zuckerproduktion


Unser Leistungsspektrum (für den Norddeutschen Raum):
- Planung
- Detailengineering
- SIL Betrachtungen nach IEC 61508 durch eigenen FS Engineer für HW/SW
- SPS Programmierung (AC500, Kleinststeuerungen)
- Fehlersichere SPS Programmierung (AC500-S, AC800M-HI)
- Leittechnik Konfigurierung (800xA, Maestro UX, AC800M, AC870P, Freelance)

- Inbetriebnahme, Probebetrieb und 24-h Rufbereitschaft

Items.Name: Pentaline - Equipamentos Industriais, Lda.
Items.Description: Pentaline delivers turn-key packaging lines focused on food, beverage and paper tissue industries, with many references on water, juices, milk, wine, sauce, oil, coffee and paper tissue companies. The long-term experience allows to deliver reliable solutions based on detailed 3D project and process simulation, stiff construction of conveyors and rinsers, elevators and lowertors, diverters and convergers, and many other own-made devices with mechanical and functional structure suited to products physics. Most of the packaging solutions includes robotic packaging and pallet processing until the exit for storage or truck loading.

Items.Name: Persico S.p.A.
Items.Description:
Persico group is an Italian multinational company primarily engaged in the automotive, rotomoulding and marine industries. Today it’s a first class provider of a full range of services: from concept to design, engineering and manufacturing of prototypes, models, moulds, automation systems and turnkey yachts.
Persico can provide customized turnkey solutions for the manufacture of auto interior and exterior components feature the best technologies for each specific product and application: 
PU processing 
Punching/Trimming 
Pressing/Forming 
Vacuum covering 
Vacuum preforming 
Glueless covering 
Laminating 
Edgefolding 
Joining
Persico Rotomoulding is a world leader in the production of rotational moulding equipment, from traditional mould procedures to SMART, the innovative all-in-one compact moulding solution.

Items.Name: Peters Elektromotoren B.V.

Items.Name: Platt Electric Supply Inc Rexel USA Inc
PLT networks GmbH
Items.Description:
Wir bündeln unsere umfassende Industrie- und Branchenkompetenz und machen so die PLT-Innovationen für Sie mit Ihrem Prozessleitsystem nutzbar, so dass Sie den Anforderungen Ihres Marktes optimal entsprechen können. Mittels unseres Know-hows verbinden wir die unterschiedlichsten Technologien und unterstützen damit Ihre Unternehmensstrategie individuell. Verschaffen Sie sich auf unserer Internetseite einen umfassenden Überblick über unsere Lösungen im Bereich Prozessleittechnik für Ihre Branche.
- Wir sind weltweit aktiv
- „LiveCycle" - wir supporten Maestro-UX-Hardware bis mindestens 2020
- Systemdienstleistungen für ABB Melody / Composer Systeme AC870P
- „PBS" Plant Backup-System
- „PDS" Plant Dokumentation-System
- „PMT" Plant Management Tool

Viele Prozesse, die unser tägliches Leben erleichtern und sichern, wie z.B. die Energieerzeugung, chemische Prozesse, Metallverarbeitung, Ölgewinnung oder die Gasgewinnung und -aufbereitung, könnten ohne die Prozessleittechnik - wenn überhaupt - nur mit deutlich größerem Aufwand und erheblich größeren Risiken betrieben werden. Daher hat die PLT sich zum Ziel gesetzt, unsere Kunden in den Bereichen
- Automatisierungs- und Steuerungstechnik
- Messtechnik & Instrumentierung
- Industrielle IT- und Netzwerktechnik
- Prozessleitsystem Design
- anlagenspezifische externe Anbindung von Standard- und Spezialsoftware

Wir unterstützen sowohl bei der Neuerrichtung von industriellen Anlagen, als auch bei Umbauten, Modernisierungen, Erweiterungen und Optimierung von bestehenden Anlagen. Unsere Erfahrung garantiert Umbauten mit den geringsten Aus- und Stillstandszeiten ihrer Anlagen.

Items.Name: PPE Technologies Mpumalanga
Items.Description:
Power Plant Electrical Technologies is a well-established, commercial sized Close Corporation, having specialised skills in the following areas:

Electrical engineering and equipment supply services, including system studies, design, project integration, installation and commissioning of high, medium and low voltage networks, control systems, and renewable energy solutions to mining operations, utilities and manufacturing industries.

-	Power and Power Quality
-	Instrumentation and Analytics
-	LV Products and Systems
-	MV Products and Systems
-	LV and MV Motors and Generators
-	PLC Automation and Control Systems
-	Outdoor Switchgear
-	Power Protection and Automation Products
-	Renewable Energy
-	Transformers
-	LV and MV Variable Speed Drives
-	UPS and Power Conditioning
We utilize these products and technical skills for the following Markets:

-	Power Generation
-	Medium and Heavy Industry
-	Renewables
-	Marine
-	Mining
-	Agriculture
-	Commercial
-	Petrochemicals 
Our service offering includes:

Engineering Services
-	Load Flow Studies
-	Electrical Protection Grading
-	Earthing System Design
-	Power Factor Correction
-	Electrical, Instrumentation & Control Systems
-	System Design & Commissioning
-	Shutdown, LV & MV Maintenance
Installations:
-	Low & Medium Voltage Switchgear Retrofits
-	Hazardous Areas Design & Installation
-	Industrial and Process Plant E&I
-	Mining and Beneficiation Plants E&I
-	Onsite Maintenance & Testing
Workshops & Manufacturing:
-	Motor Control Centre Panels
-	Power Distribution Boards
-	PLC’s & DCS Boards
-	Medium Voltage Primary Switchgear Panels
-	Bus Bar Manipulation
-	Custom LV &MV Panels
System Integration & Projects:
-	Project Integration & Management
-	Automation of Plants &Processes
-	Complete MV &LV Reticulation Systems
-	Industrial Instrumentation Systems
-	Renewable Energy Solutions

The Power Plant Electrical Technologies team knows and understands the pressures on manufacturers and counsels associated with the modern economic climate in Southern Africa. With this understanding, our objective is to offer an accredited differentiated service to provide our customers with value for money. We understand that it is important to curb unnecessary expenditure, but not to sacrifice quality or reliability of plant or distribution systems. We therefore allocate the most cost effective resource to the job, and supplement this with input and guidance from our qualified and experienced team members. We do not attempt to be the cheapest service provider, as in our opinion cheap service is achieved through the sacrifice of quality. We therefore endeavour to provide the most efficient blend of resources to achieve a cost effective, and yet quality service..
